ActCanada Student Financial Assistance Act
SubjectOrder Approving the Terms and Conditions in Direct and Risk-shared Student Loan Agreements
PrecisOrder Approving the TERMS AND CONDITIONS of existing and future loan agreements between qualifying students and the Minister of Labour for risk-shared and direct student loans under the Canada Student Financial Assistance Act.
